name: Gradius Collection
description:
A shooting fan's dream come true! Gradius™ Collection 5 classic games from the Gradius™ Series, I, II, III, IV and the long awaited Gradius™ Gaiden!

• Over 40 stages of intense action
• 5 complete action-packed shooting games
• Listen to music and watch trailers in the gallery mode
• Play in enhanced tuned modes or in original arcade settings


1 Player
Memory Stick Duo™ 128 KB



Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and User Agreement. This item has been sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America.
